languages.text: Ненависть и презрение к собратьям, отвергшим Ирлиэт Ланэвисс и лишившим ее дома, заполняли душу эльдарки ядом. Некоторое время Ирлиэт сопровождала Вольного Торговца, однако Путь Изгоя вел ее лишь к потере себя. Все изменилось, когда таинственный ксенос в пестрых одеждах прибыл незваным гостем на флагман фон Валанциус и протянул ей руку. Впереди ее ждала новая роль — но об этом летописцы Империума не знают ничего.

Hatred and disdain for her kin who had rejected her and taken away her home filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time, she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast only led to oblivion. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on the von Valancius flagship and offered her an opportunity. A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.
languages.original_text: Ненависть и презрение к собратьям, отвергшим Ирлиэт Ланэвисс и лишившим ее дома, заполняли душу эльдарки ядом. Некоторое время Ирлиэт сопровождала Вольного Торговца, однако Путь Изгоя вел ее лишь к потере себя. Все изменилось, когда таинственный ксенос в пестрых одеждах прибыл незваным гостем на флагман фон Валанциус и протянул ей руку. Впереди ее ждала новая роль — но об этом летописцы Империума не знают ничего.

traits.locale_text: Hatred and disdain for her hin, who rejected her and took her home, filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast led her towards the loosing of herself. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on von Valancius' flagship and offered her a hand. A new role awaited her now — but chroniclers of Imperium know nothing of it.

A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝对那些排斥她、害得她失去家园的族人充满了憎恨与蔑视，而她的灵魂也为怨恨所裹挟。她曾陪伴行商浪人度过一段时间，但她的流浪者道途最终也只会通往遗忘。然而，某位神秘异形的不请自来改变了这一切。他来到冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰上，给了她一个机会。某个新的角色正在等待着她，但至于具体的细节，但帝国历史的编纂者就无从得知了。
languages.original_text: Hatred and disdain for her kin who had rejected her and taken away her home filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time, she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast only led to oblivion. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on the von Valancius flagship and offered her an opportunity. A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝对那些排斥她、害得她失去家园的族人充满了憎恨与蔑视，而她的灵魂也为怨恨所裹挟。她曾陪伴行商浪人度过一段时间，但她的流浪者道途最终也只会通往遗忘。然而，某位神秘异形的不请自来改变了这一切。他来到冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰上，给了她一个机会。某个新的角色正在等待着她，但至于具体的细节，但帝国历史的编纂者就无从得知了。

languages.text: Hass und Verachtung vergifteten die Seele von Yrliet Lanaevyss — für ihre Verwandten, die sie verstoßen und ihr ihre Heimat geraubt hatten. Eine Zeit lang begleitete sie {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, doch der Pfad der Ausgestoßenen führte nur in die Vergessenheit. Alles änderte sich, als ein mysteriöser Xenos in bunter Kleidung uneingeladen auf dem Flaggschiff derer von Valancius auftauchte und ihr eine Gelegenheit bot. Eine neue Rolle erwartete sie — doch die Chronisten des Imperiums wissen nichts darüber.
languages.original_text: Hatred and disdain for her kin who had rejected her and taken away her home filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time, she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast only led to oblivion. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on the von Valancius flagship and offered her an opportunity. A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: Hass und Verachtung vergifteten die Seele von Yrliet Lanaevyss — für ihre Verwandten, die sie verstoßen und ihr ihre Heimat geraubt hatten. Eine Zeit lang begleitete sie {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, doch der Pfad der Ausgestoßenen führte nur in die Vergessenheit. Alles änderte sich, als ein mysteriöser Xenos in bunter Kleidung uneingeladen auf dem Flaggschiff derer von Valancius auftauchte und ihr eine Gelegenheit bot. Eine neue Rolle erwartete sie — doch die Chronisten des Imperiums wissen nichts darüber.

languages.text: L'âme d'Yrliet Lanaevyss s'emplit de haine et de dédain à l'encontre de ses semblables, qui l'avaient rejetée et lui avaient pris son foyer. Elle accompagna {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} durant un temps, mais la Voie de l'Errance ne la menait qu'au néant. Tout changea lorsqu'un mystérieux xénos à la tenue bigarrée se présenta de manière inopinée sur le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius afin de lui proposer un marché. Un nouveau rôle l'attendait, mais les chroniqueurs de l'Imperium ne parvinrent jamais à en savoir davantage.
languages.original_text: Hatred and disdain for her kin who had rejected her and taken away her home filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time, she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast only led to oblivion. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on the von Valancius flagship and offered her an opportunity. A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: L’âme d’Yrliet Lanaevyss s’emplit de haine et de dédain à l'encontre de ses semblables, qui l’avaient rejetée et lui avaient pris son foyer. Elle accompagna {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} durant un temps, mais la Voie de l'Errance ne la menait qu'au néant. Tout changea lorsqu’un mystérieux xénos à la tenue bigarrée se présenta de manière inopinée sur le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius afin de lui proposer un marché. Un nouveau rôle l'attendait, mais les chroniqueurs de l'Imperium ne parvinrent jamais à en savoir davantage.

languages.text: El odio y el desdén hacia sus hermanos, que la rechazaron y la expulsaron de su hogar, envenenaron el alma de Yrliet Lanaevyss. Durante un tiempo, acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, pero la Senda del Proscrito solo la conducía al olvido. Todo cambió cuando un misterioso xenos de atuendo moteado apareció de la nada en la nave insignia von Valancius y le ofreció una oportunidad. La esperaba un nuevo papel... pero los cronistas del Imperium nunca sabrían nada de él.
languages.original_text: Hatred and disdain for her kin who had rejected her and taken away her home filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time, she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast only led to oblivion. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on the von Valancius flagship and offered her an opportunity. A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.

Durante un tiempo, acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, pero la Senda del Proscrito solo la conducía al olvido. Todo cambió cuando un misterioso xenos de atuendo moteado apareció de la nada en la nave insignia von Valancius y le ofreció una oportunidad. La esperaba un nuevo papel... pero los cronistas del Imperium nunca sabrían nada de él.

languages.text: 自らを拒み住む場所を奪った同族に対する嫌悪と軽蔑が、ユリエット・ラナエフィスの魂をどこまでも毒していた。しばらくの間、彼女は自由開拓者と行動を共にしていたが、追放者の道はただ忘却につながるだけであった。まだらの衣をまとう謎の異種族が、招かれざる客としてフォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦に現れてユリエットを誘ったときにすべてが変わった。彼女には新しい役割が待っていたが、それが何であったかは、帝国の歴史の編纂者たちがうかがい知るところではない。
languages.original_text: Hatred and disdain for her kin who had rejected her and taken away her home filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time, she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast only led to oblivion. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on the von Valancius flagship and offered her an opportunity. A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: 自らを拒み住む場所を奪った同族に対する嫌悪と軽蔑が、ユリエット・ラナエフィスの魂をどこまでも毒していた。しばらくの間、彼女は自由開拓者と行動を共にしていたが、追放者の道はただ忘却につながるだけであった。まだらの衣をまとう謎の異種族が、招かれざる客としてフォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦に現れてユリエットを誘ったときにすべてが変わった。彼女には新しい役割が待っていたが、それが何であったかは、帝国の歴史の編纂者たちがうかがい知るところではない。

languages.text: Onu reddeden ve yuvasını ondan alan soydaşlarına duyduğu nefret ve küçümseme, Yrliet Lanaevyss'in ruhunu zehre boğdu. Bir süreliğine Hür Tacir'e eşlik etse de yürüdüğü Yurtsuzun Yolu, yalnızca hiçliğe çıkmaktaydı. Von Valancius sancak gemisine rengârenk kıyafetler içindeki gizemli bir zeno davetsizce gelip ona bir fırsat sunması, her şeyi değiştirdi. Artık yeni bir rolü olsa da İmparatorluk vakanüvislerinin, bu rolün ne olduğu konusunda bilgi sahibi değildir.
languages.original_text: Hatred and disdain for her kin who had rejected her and taken away her home filled Yrliet Lanaevyss's soul with venom. For a time, she accompanied the Rogue Trader, but the Path of the Outcast only led to oblivion. Everything changed when a mysterious xenos in motley garb arrived uninvited on the von Valancius flagship and offered her an opportunity. A new role awaited her — but the chroniclers of the Imperium know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: Onu reddeden ve yuvasını ondan alan soydaşlarına yönelik nefreti ve küçümsemesi, Yrliet Lanaevyss'in ruhunu zehirle doldurdu. Bir süreliğine Hür Tacir'e eşlik etti ancak Yurtsuzun Yolu yalnızca hiçliğe yöneliyordu. Von Valancius sancak gemisine rengârenk kıyafetler içindeki gizemli bir zeno davetsizce gelip ona bir fırsat sunduğunda da her şey değişti. Onu yeni bir rol bekliyordu ancak İmparatorluk'un vakanüvizlerinin konu hakkında bir bilgisi yok.
